Uses of Package
io.github.daveho.funwithsound

  • Classes in io.github.daveho.funwithsound used by io.github.daveho.funwithsound 
    Class and Description
    AddEffect
    Interface for objects that add an effect to an RealizedInstrument's effects chain.
    Chord
    A chord is a collection of one or more midi pitches (note numbers).
    Composer
    The composer class builds upon the model classes to provide a simple domain-specific language for defining compositions consisting Rhythm and Melody objects rendered using Instrument.
    Composition
    A composition is a collection of PlayFigureEvents specifying rhythms and melodies to be played on specified instruments at specified times.
    CustomInstrumentFactory
    Factory interface for creating RealizedInstrument objects for custom instrument types.
    CustomInstrumentFactoryImpl.CreateCustomInstrument
    Callback to create an RealizedInstrument for a custom instrument.
    Figure
    A Figure is a collection of one or more SimpleFigures.
    GainEvent
    Event to set the volume (gain) of an Instrument at a specified timestamp in a Composition.
    Instrument
    An instrument plays notes/sounds as specified by pairs of Melody and Rhythm objects.
    InstrumentType
    Types of instruments.
    InstrumentType.Kind
    Kinds of InstrumentTypes.
    Melody
    A melody is a sequence of Chords.
    NoteEnvelope
    Generic note envelope interface.
    NoteEvent
    Represention of a note on/off event to be dispatched to a specified Instrument.
    NoteEventCallback
    Callback to receive NoteEvents at (approximately) the time they occur.
    ParamNames
    Parameter names for components that take configuration from DataBeads.
    PlayFigureEvent
    Event to play a SimpleFigure at a specified time.
    PlayNote
    Interface for objects such as Voices and NoteEnvelopes that play notes (and need to be notified of note on/note off events.)
    RealizedInstrument
    This class is the runtime instantiation of an Instrument.
    Rhythm
    A rhythm is a sequence of Strikes.
    SampleBankUGen
    A UGen that plays samples in response to MIDI NOTE_ON events.
    SampleInfo
    Information about a sample.
    SampleRange
    Describes a range of a sample to be played by SampleBankUGen.
    Scale
    A scale is an ascending sequence of midi pitches.
    SimpleFigure
    A "simple" figure is a combination of Rhythm, Melody, and Instrument.
    Strike
    A strike represents a note or chord being played at a particular time, with a specified duration and velocity.
    SynthToolkit
    Interface allowing the creation of synthesizer modules such as Voices and NoteEnvelopes.
    SynthToolkitBuilder
    Fluid builder for creating a SynthToolkit using the available Voice and NoteEnvelope implementations.
    Tempo
    Tempo determines the absolute tempo (beats per minute) and also, based on the number of beats per measure, helps determine microsecond offsets and durations of events (e.g., Strikes) occuring within a measure.
    Voice
    Interface for synth voice components.
